---
title: "Plot Example"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| include: false
echo = FALSE
library(plotly)

```

```{r}
#| include: false
data <- readRDS("./data/hydatdata.rds")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
summary(data)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = as.Date(Date), y = Value, colour = STATION_NUMBER)) +
    geom_line(na.rm = FALSE) +
    labs(x = "Streamflow", y = "Date") +
    ggtitle("Raw HYDAT Data All Stations Winisk")
```
